rules_text:
Whenever you put a counter on another permanent you control, put a +1/+1 counter on Herald of Ruination. This ability triggers only once each turn.
Surpass {5}{G} [i]({5}{G}: Transform this creature. This costs {1} less to activate for each counter on it. Activate only as a sorcery.)[/i]
rules_text2: At the beginning of combat on your turn, Ruination’s Hand gains flying until end of turn if a creature you control or a creature card in your graveyard has flying. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, hexproof, haste, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.
